summary: This release adds a self-service domain checker, lets you change your username, and rebuilds the RSS feed with rate limiting. Under the hood, I migrated more services to the new Infra SDK, added an Onboarding Agent Durable Object for email sequences, and rebuilt all the command-line binaries for the latest changes. Also fixed a bunch of things, from Stripe webhooks to mobile layout quirks.

add prominent publish toggle + fix View Live button size
add Zig/WASM validation and search modules
export transcription types from public API
